categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Harok was a Human male who served as a colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire's military during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he was stationed on Nar Shaddaa under order of admiral Jefand Ange, where along with Sith Lord Zavrasha he asked an Imperial to execute a series of strikes aimed to weaken the Republic forces on the planet.

Colonel Harok appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Nar Shaddaa and starts the planet's bonus series named "Shattering the Peace". Female characters have an option to flirt with him.
